description:
Fire chiefs have issued a warning after an e-scooter was blamed for a devastating blaze that tore through a row of seven houses.

The post E-Scooter Causes Fire That Burns Down Seven Homes appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: E-Scooter Causes Fire That Burns Down Seven Homes

description:
BBC 'Disinformation Correspondent' Marianna Spring worries about Russian spies, trolls, bots and Brexiteers. But most of all she worries "real people" will be "emboldened" to talk about politics online.

The post Springtime for Tyrants appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Springtime for Tyrants

description:
According to a BBC report, a group of macaques on Monkey Island in Puerto Rico got along better after a hurricane. Could it be that extreme weather isn’t all bad? asks Sallust.

The post Climate Change Could be Just the Tonic Humanity Needs appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Climate Change Could be Just the Tonic Humanity Needs

description:
In his latest deep dive inot Starmerism for the Daily Sceptic, J Sorel discovers a bland, deep state functionary tasked with destroying parliamentary sovereignty so nothing like Brexit can ever happen again.

The post Starmerism Means the Wholesale Transfer of Power From Parliament to Civil Servants, Judges and Quangocrats appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmerism Means the Wholesale Transfer of Power From Parliament to Civil Servants, Judges and Quangocrats

description:
Lurking behind the election, Paul Sutton spies Tony Blair and his technocratic heirs, similarly committed to putting the 'grown-ups' in charge and smearing and smothering all dissent.

The post Lurking Behind the Election: Blair and His Technocratic Heirs appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Lurking Behind the Election: Blair and His Technocratic Heirs

description:
Why is it the sections of the Labour and Conservative manifestos dealing with the NHS are almost identical? Because both parties know elected politicians have long since had control of the NHS taken away from them.

The post The Daily Sceptic’s In-House Doctor Casts a Cynical Eye Over the NHS Bits in the Party Manifestos appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Daily Sceptic’s In-House Doctor Casts a Cynical Eye Over the NHS Bits in the Party Manifestos

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
